headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Sumo
content: This week marks the return of beloved modes Sumo, Till Death Do Us Part, The Vespucci Job, and Trap Door. To mark the occasion, you’ll earn 2X GTA$ and RP for playing Sumo — smashing and mashing your opponents’ vehicles out of a designated area, whether that be alone or in teams. When the countdown nears its end, the desperation in the air is palpable.
